column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man drove his van into a sewage drainage canal at 7.30 am on April 9
column7: the man was identified as a 26 year old staff member at the Minghui Gymnasium
column10: causing 6 meters of damage to state property before landing in the ditch.------Traffic police officers said there were no injuries to people and allowed a crane to come to remove the vehicle.------http://www.phnompenhreporter.com/article/72262
